resources.string: The list of the stations is currently updating.
Do you really want to update the stations list (this action may take time and WIFI connection is recommended)?
It\'s the first time you use this network.\nDo you want to update the stations list (this action may take time) ?
Please wait while getting availabilities for your favorites.
Partial information about the searched station (address, number, ...)
No stations found, please retry. You entered :
The entered address does not match any coordonnates, please retry.
Unable to use you location providers (GPS or else). Please check their status before retry
Are you sure you want to delete that favorite
Timer ends! You are about to be geolocated.
No internet connection ! Please check your network
Do you want to read a quick start guide ? It may help you using Veloid depending on the kind of user you are. This action opens a web brower.
Rent/Return a bike in the Nextbike network (open a web browser)
Please consult the website http://www.veloid.fr for more information, update, bug report, suggestion ...etc
Number of stations to be displayed on the map screen
Number of stations scanned to fit the filter, on the map screen
Select a network to work on
to update the station list for the selected network
to delete all stations from the current network
Do you really want to delete all the stations from the network
All stations has been deleted for the network
to open the Veloid quick start guide (open a web browser)

Dear user,
Veloid is currently available here as an "advanced draft" work.
Any feedback, encouragement can be highly appreciated. Please be indulgent since I don\'t have a Android phone to make real tests.
I think Android phones will be available in my country in April \'09(!!!) What I can ensure is that it's working well on my emulator.
Veloid allows you to use some bike sharing networks (Washington smartbikeDC, London Oybike, and other European (mainly French) networks such as Velib in Paris).
The main screen displays favorite stations. The "Menu" button gives you access to advanced actions else everything is available from the 4 button on the bottom of the main screen:
1 - Search bikes nearby (open a map)
2 - Search slots nearby (open a map)
3 - Refresh favorite data
4 - Advanced menu (add favorite/search from address - delete favorite - geolocation - timer)
The full user guide is available on the application website: http://www.veloid.fr/en
